content.description: Route of All Evil lies on the south face of the Evil Pillar, about 10Â’ to the left of Necessary Evil.  This is a very fun easy moderate that climbs mostly on plates.  Start just left of the lesser block in front of Evil Pillar, scrambling up to the right to a ledge between the rocks.  From there, follow the bolt line up past large plates, veering slightly left after the last bolt.  The crux is a delicate section at the second bolt, the one spot where one has to make a couple moves without benefit of the plates.  Even so, probably easier than the listed rating.  Rappel to descend.
Climbs the obvious overhanging sculpted arete using balancey moves down low which lead to the upper section of jugs. If this thing went for another hundred feet or so it would be an all-time classic.
content.location:
Around and right from

Route of All Evil

on the east face of the formation.

content.description:
Obvious block flaring chimney,head towards the right, up and over to the left detached boulder.Bolted anchor.Dont go off route into the bird guano.

Depending on the season/weather,the whole corner area around mental games is quite dirty from run off.
content.location: About 20 yards left from Necessary Evil cave entrance on the Evil Pillar and right next to Hanzo, Sword of Justice.

content.description:
Easy flaring fist crack up to easy ow.Rappel off bolted anchors for Mental Games Or walk off to the left.

Depending on the season/weather,the whole corner area around mental games is quite dirty from run off.
content.location: About 20 yards left from Necessary Evil cave entrance on the Evil Pillar and right next to Mental Games Chimney.
